body: Some days are only 23 hours long, some are 25. Most are 24, but not today. I think it's fine to stop at hours, which are often 1/24 of a day. Otherwise where do you stop? Week? Month? Year? Decade? Century? Millennium? Era? We must stop somewhere, and for computer usage hour seems like a fine drawing point since real ambiguity sets in at the next level. (The one second of a minute around a leap second is not a real issue here.)
